Articles.Content:
When a Kerbal falls out of the 'External Command Seat', they are uncontrollable and counted as 'debris'. They stand back up after falling out, but they are just standing there, uncontrollable. I have do do some fancy save-editing to get them to be counted as EVAing Kerbals.

Is there a quick fix for this? Is anyone else having this problem too?

Thanks!

Save editing is the quickest fix ATM. You could edit a quicksave and load it so you don't have to quit the game. It's one of the known issues in the Cross-Platform Issues thread and Claw just started a thread for everyone who wants to help track down the cause. Read all about it in the BUST sticky.
